text: Ragna Berget Jørgensen (born 19 November 1941 in Skogn) is a Norwegian politician for the Labour Party. Jørgensen was a member of Bodø city council between 1979 and 1983. She was elected to the Norwegian Parliament from Nordland in 1981, and was re-elected on three occasions. She resides at Evje, Akershus. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Labour Party (Norway) politicians Category:Women members of the Storting Category:Members of the Storting Category:20th-century Norwegian politicians Category:20th-century Norwegian women politicians
title: Ragna Berget Jørgensen
